messages.content: ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview is a repository that allows users to visualize the styles from sdxl_prompt_styler.
What is the purpose of ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview?
The purpose of ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview is to provide a glimpse into the styles offered by SDXL Prompt Styler through preview images.
What does the demo gif in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview showcase?
The demo gif in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview showcases the capabilities of visualizing styles from sdxl_prompt_styler.
How many preview images are available in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview?
There are two preview images available in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview, both showcasing SDXL Prompt Styler.
What is the source of the preview images in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview?
All preview images in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview were generated using sdxl 1.0.
sdxl_prompt_styler is a tool that offers various styles for prompts, and its styles can be visualized in ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview.
ComfyUI-Custom-Scripts is one of the references mentioned in the ComfyUI-Prompt-Preview repository, indicating a related resource.
